alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 01 at 2:15PM MDT until November 02 at 11:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PDT WEDNESDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Accumulating snow expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches above 3000 feet. Snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches above 4000 feet. Isolated areas of freezing rain are expected before the precipitation changes to all snow. A light glaze of ice is possible. * WHERE...Dixie, Elk City, and Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 10 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility during periods of heavy snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
